member.name: IMFByteStreamTimeSeek.GetTimeSeekResult
member.summary: Gets the result of a time-based seek.
member.param: Receives the new position after the seek, in 100-nanosecond units.
Receives the stop time, in 100-nanosecond units. If the stop time is unknown, the value is zero.
Receives the total duration of the file, in 100-nanosecond units. If the duration is unknown, the value is –1.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The byte stream does not support time-based seeking, or no data is available.

member.name: IMFByteStreamTimeSeek.IsTimeSeekSupported
member.summary: Queries whether the byte stream supports time-based seeking.
member.param: Receives the value TRUE if the byte stream supports time-based seeking, or FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFByteStreamTimeSeek.TimeSeek
member.summary: Seeks to a new position in the byte stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFByteStreamTimeSeek
member.summary: Seeks a byte stream by time position.
